values.value: Restrict access to cardholder data by business need to know. Access must be limited to only those individuals whose job requires such access.
PCI-DSS Requirement 7 - Restrict Access to Cardholder Data

1. Define access control policies for cardholder data 2. Implement role-based access control 3. Restrict access to system components 4. Document access approval process 5. Set default deny-all for cardholder data 6. Conduct quarterly access reviews
